title: Lag - Novel Updates
author: Tsukina   月那
description:
Hikaru Sekiya gets mixed up in some senseless trouble, and before he knows it he’s hurled into a world he couldn’t imagine.

That world was just slightly different from his own.

But that slight difference was incredibly frustrating. And just when he gets used to daily life in that slightly different world…

A tiny sci-fi, but a bittersweet one.>
